etymology.description: phonetic 冎(冎) (guā, "pot") + semantic 口(口) (kǒu, "mouth") = mouth or opening related to a container -> pot
etymology.interpretation: The character 呙(呙) (guō, "pot") combines the phonetic 冎(冎) (guā, "pot") with the semantic 口(口) (kǒu, "mouth"), suggesting the idea of a vessel or container with an opening for storing or holding items. This reflects the function of a pot as an object with a mouth or opening.
